mapper.sql: tid, tname, thead, tage, education, certification, experience, begoodat, selfassessment, tphone, tcardid, phone, password, sex, wechat
mapper.update: update teacher set password=#{password} where phone=#{phone}
mapper.insert: insert into teacher (tid, tname, thead, tage, education, certification, experience, begoodat, selfassessment, tphone, tcardid, phone, password, sex, wechat ) values (#{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thead,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{experience,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{begoodat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selfassessment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tcardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update teacher

where tid = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
